       <div id="wrapbox17848422">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17848422">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17848422">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content17848422">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>

           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business
           <br />
           Subject Specialist

            kcannon@muhlenberg.edu

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17848423">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17848423">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17848423">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference Works (Tertiary)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17848423">
          <div id="boxatt17848423" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20982732">
              <a id="link_20982732" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20982732,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust, Nazi Germany, and Jews', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21113740">
              <a id="link_21113740" href="http://www.bjeindy.org/resources/library/access-to-encyclopedia-judaica/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21113740,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust, Nazi Germany, and Jews', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21113657}); ">
               Encyclopedia Judaica
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encyclopedia Judaica is made available to the community through the generosity of the Bureau of Jewish Education and its donors.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20958996">
              <a id="link_20958996" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://literati.credoreference.com/content/title/brilljud" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20958996,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust, Nazi Germany, and Jews', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20958996}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Judaism
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides a full and reliable account of Judaism, beginning in ancient Israelite times and extending to our own day. Published in collaboration with the Museum of Jewish Heritage, New York.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20972039">
              <a id="link_20972039" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20972039,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust, Nazi Germany, and Jews', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A communally-written encyclopedia. Anyone can edit or contribute an entry, at any time. Excellent for locating controversies on a topic and getting ideas for research papers. The bibliographies often point to scholarly resources. Not itself a scholarly source per se, with no authority control. Compare with Scholarpedia.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17848424">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17848424">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17848424">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Books (Primary or Secondary)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17848424">
          <div id="boxatt17848424" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20959000">
              <a id="link_20959000" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20959000,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust, Nazi Germany, and Jews', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20958999">
              <a id="link_20958999" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20958999,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust, Nazi Germany, and Jews', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12464693}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search catalogs from libraries across the country and around the globe.  Items owned by Trexler Library show a Muhlenberg College Library icon.  Request items not owned by Trexler Library directly through WorldCat using the ILL (Interlibrary Loan) button. Items generally take 2-10 days to arrive.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17848425">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17848425">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17848425">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly Journal Articles (Secondary)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17848425">
          <div id="boxatt17848425" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20959003">
              <a id="link_20959003" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20959003,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust, Nazi Germany, and Jews', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20972090">
              <a id="link_20972090" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20972090,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust, Nazi Germany, and Jews', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing, abstracts, and selected full text of articles appearing in history journals, with emphasis on world history from 1450 to present (excluding the U.S. and Canada which are covered in America: History and Life). It includes citations to books, journal articles, and dissertations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20959002">
              <a id="link_20959002" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=jph" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20959002,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust, Nazi Germany, and Jews', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767659}); ">
               Index to Jewish Periodicals
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Comprehensive index to English-language articles from journals devoted to Jewish affairs.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20959004">
              <a id="link_20959004" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20959004,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust, Nazi Germany, and Jews', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717122}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of scholarly journals from most academic disciplines. Coverage is from the inception of the journal through three to five years ago. Current issues are often to be found in Project Muse (see below). Includes nearly 300 journals specific to language and literature, including American Literary History, American Quarterly, Chaucer Review, College Composition and Communication, College English, College Literature, Early American Literature, ELH, English Journal, New Literary History, Shakespeare Quarterly, Southern Literary Journal, and Yearbook of English Studies.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17848426">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17848426">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17848426">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Websites as Primary Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17848426">
          <div id="boxatt17848426" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20959005">
              <a id="link_20959005" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20959005,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust, Nazi Germany, and Jews', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20959005}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Blogs and other opinion-based websites can function as primary source material to gauge contemporary attitudes about a particular concept. In addition, statistical websites can serve as a source for primary documentation.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4831225" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17848427">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17848427">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17848427">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17848427">
          <div id="boxatt17848427" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20959006">
              <a id="link_20959006" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20959006,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust, Nazi Germany, and Jews', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20959006}); ">
               Trexler Library Citation Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief, easy-to-use guides to the 3 most used citation styles: APA, Chicago (Turabian), MLA.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20959007">
              <a id="link_20959007" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20959007,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Holocaust, Nazi Germany, and Jews', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20959007}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free citation tool. Does the citing for you! Loved by librarians, professors, and students alike.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17848428">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17848428">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17848428">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content17848428">
          Most any item not immediately available in our library or in the research databases can be requested on
          <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
           interlibrary loan
          </a>
          by filling out the appropriate form for
          <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illj~S0">
           articles
          </a>
          or
          <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illb~S0">
           books
          </a>
          .
          <div id="boxatt17848428" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
